WRITING.TEXT: It's cold here, really cold here. I hold my breath when I go outside to start the car.

WRITING.TITLE: How would you get your keys out of your car if you accidentally locked them inside the car?
WRITING.TEXT: EDIT: it's gonna cost 55$ on the spot to get it opened. Now I need to find 55$

WRITING.TITLE: Reddit, can you give me a bedtime story?
My girlfriend torrented music and all album covers had this guys face on it
What is the worst movie of all time in your honest opinion?
What was the best way you were ever surprised with a gift?
That awesome feeling when playing Big Oil for the first time
WRITING.TEXT:
Everyone does great following the pro.
Pro lead everyone into the basement.
Everyone bags up every engine.
"What do we do now Mr.pro?"
"Have fun playing doctor you idiots"
Pro throws grenades at us and leaves.
What an asshole.
I proceed to lead the team.
"Grab a bag boys"
I'm the only one who doesn't get knocked down so I take my engine to the helicopter.
"Restart the game" everyone says
(It's a pro job)
Waiting feels like forever when I'm all alone.
.......
..it's the right engine on the first try. Team goes bananas at my luck.
Best feeling ever
